page.title: 08Family life in 1985
page.content:
In July 1985 families live in
many different ways. This is just about mine. We live in{West Surrey}where there is not too much unemployment. I work as a{teacher}in a primary school about three miles away and drive the car to get there. My wife works as a {secretary}in a forestry company and bicycles about a mile and a half to her office. We have{three children. }The elder girl is married and works in an {insurance}company's offices, her husband works behind the counter in the{Post Office.} Our son works in {Saudi Arabia}and does six weeks there then has three weeks holiday at home. Our youngest daughter is at an {Institute of Higher Education}studying for a B.A. degree.
